name: Two Mosquitoes
description:
A prototype experimental game for 2 players.

COLLECT 10 COINS TO WIN

OR - KILL  ANOTHER PLAYER WITH ONE OF THE 2 WEAPONS (TONGUE OR BEAM).

EACH MATCH LASTS 4 MINUTES (240 SECONDS).

TWO PLAYERS CAN PLAY ON A SINGLE COMPUTER KEYBOARD USING HOTKEYS:

PLAYER 1 (LEFT)

  • A - MOVE LEFT
  • D - MOVE RIGHT
  • S - CROUCH, MOVE DOWN
  • W - MOVE UP
  • SPACE - JUMP
  • Q - DASH
  • E - ATTACK

PLAYER 2 (RIGHT)

  • LEFT ARROW - MOVE LEFT
  • RIGHT ARROW - MOVE RIGHT
  • DOWN ARROW - CROUCH, MOVE DOWN
  • UP ARROW  - MOVE UP
  • J  - JUMP
  • K  - DASH
  • L  - ATTACK
